summary: EITHER WITH THE VEHICLE RUNNING OR IF THE ENGINE IS TURNED OFF. FROM TIME TO TIME THERE IS A VERY LOUD CLICKING NOISE THAT COMES FROM THE RIGHT SIDE OF THE DASHBOARD. I WAS TOLD IT WAS A HEATER ACTUATOR, WHICH CONTROLS THE VENT DOOR. ITS A $2.00 PART THAT IS BURIED INSIDE OF THE DASH. TOTAL COST FOR LABOR $1600, THE ENTIRE DASH BOARD HAS TO COME OUT TO GET TO THE HEATER UNIT. THIS IS A PROBLEM WITH ARMADAS AND TITANS 2004-2008. IT SHOULD BE A RECALL.  *TR
